languages.text: The wearer's first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} is calculated as if {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} were increased by +3 and always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g}.

languages.text: Takan kişinin bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunttaki{/g} ilk {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücü{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi derecesi{/g} +3 artmış gibi hesaplanır ve her zaman {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}ruhsezi fenomeni{/g} tetikler.

traits.locale_text: Takan kişinin bir raunttaki ilk ruhsezi gücü, ruhsezi derecesi +3 artmış gibi hesaplanır ve her zaman ruhsezi fenomeni tetikler.

languages.text: El primer {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} que utilice el portador en cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} se calcula como si su {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} aumentase en +3 y siempre provoca {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}fenómenos psíquicos{/g}.
languages.original_text: The wearer's first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} is calculated as if {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} were increased by +3 and always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El primer poder psíquico que utilice el portador en cada asalto se calcula como si su factor psíquico aumentase en +3 y siempre provoca fenómenos psíquicos.

languages.text: 装备者每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次使用的{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}在计算效果时，视为{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}提高3级，且此灵能能力必定会触发{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}灵能异象{/g}。
languages.original_text: The wearer's first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} is calculated as if {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} were increased by +3 and always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 装备者每轮中首次使用的灵能能力在计算效果时，视为灵能等级提高3级，且此灵能能力必定会触发灵能异象。

languages.text: Die erste vom Träger in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} eingesetzte {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kraft{/g} wird berechnet, als betrüge sein {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} +3, und sie löst immer {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psionische Phänomene{/g} aus.
languages.original_text: The wearer's first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} is calculated as if {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} were increased by +3 and always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die erste vom Träger in einer Runde eingesetzte psionische Kraft wird berechnet, als betrüge sein Psi-Wert +3, und sie löst immer psionische Phänomene aus.

languages.text: Le premier {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} que le porteur utilise au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} est calculé comme si l'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} était augmenté de +3 et déclenche systématiquement des {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}phénomènes psychiques{/g}.
languages.original_text: The wearer's first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} is calculated as if {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} were increased by +3 and always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le premier pouvoir psychique que le porteur utilise au cours d'un round est calculé comme si l'indice psy était augmenté de +3 et déclenche systématiquement des phénomènes psychiques.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で最初に使用する{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}が+3増加したものとして計算され、常に{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}心霊現象{/g}を引き起こす。
languages.original_text: The wearer's first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} is calculated as if {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} were increased by +3 and always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者がラウンドで最初に使用する超能力は、超能力レートが+3増加したものとして計算され、常に心霊現象を引き起こす。
使用者がラウンドで最初に使用する超能力は、超能力レートが+3増加したものとして計算され、常に心霊現象を引き起こす。

languages.text: Первая {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосила{/g}, примененная персонажем за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, рассчитывается с увеличенным на 3 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтингом{/g} и всегда вызывает {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}пси-морок{/g}.
languages.original_text: The wearer's first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} is calculated as if {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} were increased by +3 and always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Первая психосила, примененная персонажем за раунд, рассчитывается с увеличенным на 3 пси-рейтингом и всегда вызывает пси-морок.
